quote: Boy, the solid things you can hold in your hands are never all you've got. They're the least of what belong to you. The qualities inside you, those are what you've really got to defend yourself with.
quote_letters: BOY THE SOLID THINGS YOU CAN HOLD IN YOUR HANDS ARE NEVER ALL YOUVE GOT THEYRE THE LEAST OF WHAT BELONG TO YOU THE QUALITIES INSIDE YOU THOSE ARE WHAT YOUVE REALLY GOT TO DEFEND YOURSELF WITH
